com.snowworld.configgui.title: SnowWorld Config
snowworld.config.snowaccumulation.commen: All configuration items related to the accumulation of snow in the world.
snowworld.config.accumulationrate.commen: How quickly snow accumulates [200 = slow, 10 = fast].
snowworld.config.smoothing.comment: How many sides need to be at the same level before more snow is allowed to accumulate [0 = none, 4 = all].
snowworld.config.driftarea.comment: Number of blocks to increase the snow level at around a snow accumulation event [1 = single block, 5 = a + sign, 9 = all around].
snowworld.config.maxlayers.comment: Max snow layers to accumulate during snowfall, 8 layers per block [0 = disabled, 8 = full block, -1 = no max, keep on growing].
snowworld.config.meltrate.comment: How quickly snow melts [400 = slow, 20 = fast].
snowworld.config.minlayers: Min amount of layers in snow biomes
snowworld.config.minlayers.comment: Base snow layers to leave when melting [1 = a single layer, 8 = full block].
